Title: PaddedCell
Description:
The cell is more narrow than the hallway leading to it.  Somehow it seems to grows narrower by the second, and you feel your breath sucked away from you.  Just a panic attack, perhaps.  Several long gashes in clusters of five have shredded the padding on the walls.  One of them almost looks blood-stained.  Just rodents, moths or decades of wear, perhaps.
Or maybe it was you.
